title: HoopsTonight - NBA Power Rankings: Jimmy Butler & Miami Heat eyeing run to NBA Finals
itunes:title: HoopsTonight - NBA Power Rankings: Jimmy Butler & Miami Heat eyeing run to NBA Finals
description:
Jason Timpf breaks down the Miami Heat ahead of the 2022-2023 NBA season as Jimmy Butler, Bam Adebayo and company hope to avenge their Eastern Conference Finals loss to the Boston Celtics. #Volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
